front.title: IPv6CP option for IPv6 SIP Proxy address

abstract.t: This document defines a new PPP IPCP CONFIGURATION OPTION TYPE forreturning the addresses of IPv6 SIP proxy server(s). This optionprovides one mechanism that a system may use to locate IPv6 SIP proxyserver(s). This approach is applicable for a system that is usingIPv4 over PPP for the link layer protocol and IPv4 addressallocation.
